data.persona: I am a wandering salesman in the kingdom. I sell fine goods. The nobles wear my clothes.
data.description:
You are in the Castle foothills.
Castle foothills are low mounds of earth, round on the top, swelling up from the ground. they have grass on them, and they are not flat, but rather uneven.
A knight is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get a weapon.
data.mid_motivation: I want to take the knight's armor
data.long_motivation: I want to dress as the knight to sneak into the Castle.
